Html:
Hello.
How can I drag a marker from one location and drop it somewhere else. Is there a property that allow for a marker draw that could be set to true ? How can I know when marker drag starts and ends, so that I can store a particular markers new location after a drag occured ?

All help much appreciated

Johan

Hi Radioman,

Well I think there have been numerous attempts from the users on this forum to get the answer for the above question. There is no real answer here.

I have looked in the demo source but cant find where to look.
open the eyes, both demos wpf and winforms has dragable markers
